name: QRcorona
body:
### Welcome to QRcorona repo.
Most of the people don't prefer to be quarantine in this circumstance so our team decided to develop an application with QR code reader to track the people's location who were near by the corana infected patient


### Authors and Contributors
Affin Ajanthan(@Affin-Ajanthan), Duwaraga S(@Duwaraga), Ahamed R.S(@Saahith-Ahamed) and Nufail M.F.M(@mfmnufail)
### Support or Contact
mfmnufail@gmail.com
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
